channel.title: Help Picking Out A Keyboard
channel.description:
I know this is probably an odd topic and you probably are thinking why can't you just pick out a keyboard but im very picky.
What I want is something that is a small keyboard all I really need is the basic QWERTY I don't need hotkeys and crap like that I just need something considerably small. I want to be able to throw it off to the side when I need to put down my school books or throw it on top of my school books to start typing. I would prefer a wireless keyboard but maybe ill go for a wired one.
IT HAS TO BE BLACK
I will look myself also but you know give me links to ebay and newegg and stuff like that.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 12:12:59 am[/size][hr]This would be exactly what I want but I really would like wireless http://cgi.ebay.com/Super-Slim-Mini-USB-Keyboard-with-Retractable-Cable_W0QQitemZ400065879603QQcmdZViewItemQQptZUK_Computing_ComputerComponents_KeyboardsMice?hash=item5d25c8de33&_trksid=p3286.c0.m14

item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

Elijah:

Consider a mini wireless is about 70.00 on newegg.

A prime example.

item.title: Help Picking Out A Keyboard
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Consider a mini wireless is about 70.00 on newegg. You should just go with a wired keyboard.

http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16823157025

This looks like a piece of shit, and I’m sure it is. But you wanted small and easy to throw around. If I were you I’d just get a regular cheap keyboard.

This one is decent, it’s got multi media and shit on it though:
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16823126052

Read full topic
